sentences.en: He dazzled the crowd with his oratory.
sentences.cn: 他的雄辩口才使听众赞叹不已.

sentences.en: He displayed determination as well as powerful oratory.
sentences.cn: 他既展示出震撼人心的雄辩术，又显露了矢志不移的决心。

sentences.en: He loved the sound of his own oratory.
sentences.cn: 他喜欢自己滔滔不绝的雄辩之声.

sentences.en: He pulverized the opposition with the force of his oratory.
sentences.cn: 他能言善辩把对方驳得体无完肤.

sentences.en: He roused the masses with his oratory.
sentences.cn: 他以其雄辩术唤起民众.

sentences.en: His oratory soon had the crowd booing his opponents.
sentences.cn: 他能言善辩,很快就鼓动起人群向他的对手们大喝倒彩.

sentences.en: I admire the oratory of some politicians.
sentences.cn: 我佩服某些政治家的辩才.

sentences.en: Some politicians are famous for their powers of oratory.
sentences.cn: 有些政治家以辩才著称.

sentences.en: Such a perspective will help us obtain a better approach of interpreting his oratory.
sentences.cn: 这样的角度能帮助我们获得理解他的话语的新途径.

sentences.en: The wedding will be at the Brompton Oratory next month.
sentences.cn: 婚礼将于下月在布朗普顿礼拜堂举行。

sentences.en: They were defeated by the power of her oratory.
sentences.cn: 她靠能言善辩战胜了他们.

sentences.en: Your music and oratory inspire your allies to greater deeds of valor.
sentences.cn: 你的音乐与言辞激励你的盟友做出更加伟大的勇敢行为.
